skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Cronkite News is the proud news division of Arizona PBS. Our newscast airs Monday through Friday at 5 p.m. and again at 11 p.m. on Arizona PBS channel 8.1. The Cronkite News Spanish-language newscast, Cronkite Noticias, currently airs on Univision Arizona. Our multiplatform news organization that covers news, business and sports from Arizona, Washington, D.C., and Los Angeles.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
